# PKToolPickerLassoItem

**Class**

An item that represents a lasso tool in the tool picker.

## Declaration

```swift
class PKToolPickerLassoItem
```

## Overview

A lasso item represents a [doc://com.apple.pencilkit/documentation/PencilKit/PKLassoTool-swift.struct] — a tool for selecting stroked lines and shapes in a canvas view — in a [doc://com.apple.pencilkit/documentation/PencilKit/PKToolPicker].

## Creating a lasso item

- **init()**: Creates a new lasso item.

## Accessing the lasso tool

- **lassoTool**: A lasso tool for selecting parts of a drawing.

## Creating a tool picker

- **init()**: Creates a new tool picker with a default set of tools.
- **init(toolItems:)**: Creates a new tool picker with the tools you specify.
- **PKToolPickerInkingItem**: An item that represents an inking tool in the tool picker.
- **PKToolPickerEraserItem**: An item that represents an eraser tool in the tool picker.
- **PKToolPickerRulerItem**: An item that represents a ruler tool in the tool picker.
- **PKToolPickerScribbleItem**: An item that represents a Scribble tool in the tool picker.
- **PKToolPickerCustomItem**: An item that represents a custom tool in the tool picker.
- **PKToolPickerItem**: The base class for an item in the tool picker.

## Inherits From

- PKToolPickerItem
